name: Dark Search (1 Hour Game)
description:
Controls:

Q = Pick up torch

Space = Place down torch

Mechanics:

Bats are killed in light. Watch out for spikes! Light shows hidden walls.

Dark Search is a game project made in 1 hour. It is a 2d top-down search game, where you have to find the gold coin to win. This game might be updated for more levels in the future.
